str2: Feminine of a presumed derivative apparently from the base of chasma through the idea of deficiency; a widow, literally or figuratively.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To enter in a list, register, enroll. From kata and lego; to lay down, i.e. to enrol.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Active - Nominative Feminine Singular
str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.
Less, smaller; poorer, inferior. Or elatton el-at-tone'; comparative of the same as elachistos; smaller.
Sixty. The tenth multiple of hex; sixty.
A year. Apparently a primary word; a year.
A woman, wife, my lady. Probably from the base of ginomai; a woman; specially, a wife.
One. (including the neuter Hen); a primary numeral; one.
A male human being; a man, husband. A primary word; a man.
